biotools.summary: Checkpoint Therapeutic Targets and Modulators Database (CKTTD) for Cancer Immunotherapy is a comprehensive database for checkpoint targets and their modulators in cancer immunotherapy. Immune checkpoints are regulators of the immune system which prevents the immune system from attacking cells indiscriminately.
